name: MEC Aquadash Packable Waterproof Cycling Rain Pants - Men's
categories: Aquadash Packable Waterproof Cycling Rain Pan
description:
These streamlined waterproof shell pants are perfect for rainy commutes. Lightweight, breathable and cut for optimal coverage and mobility while riding, they have the handy bonus feature of packing into their own rear zip pocket. Keep them stowed neatly in your pack or pannier until needed. Ankle zips help you pull them on over your cycling shoes when time is of the essence.Made of lightweight, packable 40-denier nylon with a Pertex Shield waterproof breathable coating.Unlined 2.5-layer construction keeps them lightweight and packable.Fully taped seams for reliable waterproofness.Elastic waist has an internal drawcord for adjustability.High back design provides coverage when in the riding position.Rear pocket has a zip closure for secure storage, and doubles as a pouch for the pants,Back crotch gusset ensures no seams between you and the saddle.Articulated knees for mobility.Ankle zips let you pull them on and off without removing shoes.Elastic rear cuff helps keep splashes and debris out.Heat transfer reflective strips near ankle zips are durable and bright.

Regular fit, Regular rise



Fit guide

Garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering


All MEC men’s and boy’s pants are regular rise.




        Sustainability
